blog.title: Stony fics blog
blog.description:
A blog dedicated to Stony (Steve Rogers x Tony Stark, Marvel) fanfiction and Stony in general (mostly tickle fics). Will contain a lot of fics, some stony posts and some private whining and all the good stuff! Browse the masterpost, read fics, and enjoy your stay!

NOT ACCEPTING PROMPTS
MASTERPOST

title: Having Time
body:
fandom: Tony and Rhodey brootp (Marvel, MCU)

summary: Rhodey is plannig to rest when an unusually quiet Tony strolls into his apartment, offering pizza and longing companionship.

length: 1 110 words

a/n: Happy Birthday, @nhasablog!! I offer you as a gift this fic, as I know that you enjoy Tony and Rhodey being bros, and I hope you had a fantastic day and remember that your friends (including me) all love you (and like half of tumblr if not more) and wish you all the happiness in the world!

——————–

Having Time

Knock, knock.

Rhodey didn’t move a muscle. He was stretched out on the couch, in the small apartment he had in New York for the time he was off the base and nodding through one of his rare free days. He had a lot of sleep to catch up on.

KNOCK, KNOCK, KNOCK.

Slowly, the sound was getting through him. He opened his eyes, taking in the surroundings and easing his mind into a thought that he was off duty, and the persistent sound was not a sound of an alarm, just someone knocking at his door. That someone probably being the pizza delivery, as Rhodey had ordered some food before nodding off.

“Coming, coming!” he called, lifting himself up with a grunt before knocking could turn into banging on the wood. He opened the door, seeing a familiar face. “Tony!”

“Hi, honey badger,” Tony answered, smiling brightly and holding a pizza box in his hands. “Delivery!” he announced, making his way into the apartment, not needing an invitation.

“Stark Industries is not doing that great and you have to earn cash aside?” Rhodey asked with a yawn, closing the door. “You could have called me that you plan to come over.”

“I did. Your phone has to be on mute. Eat your food before it gets cold,” Tony said in his characteristic short sentences, putting the box down on the coffee table.

“How did you get my food—”

“Saw the delivery boy. I gave him a big tip so he would hand it over to me. People know that I know you.”

“And he gave it to you just like that?” Rhodey asked, sitting down on the couch.

Tony laughed. It was a bit strained kind of laugh, not the cheerful one Tony usually had. “No one says no to Iron Man.”

“One would think you might run off with the pizza,” Rhodey said, opening the box and taking a slice. He chewed on it slowly, trying to be not too obvious with staring at Tony. At the way, his shoulders were lowered, and his head seemed to be dropping down and the deep shadows etched into the skin under his eyes. Seemed that while Rhodey was catching up on sleep, Tony wasn’t getting any at all.

“Ew, no,” Tony scrunched his nose, eyeing with disgust all the veggies toppling on the pizza slice. “Putting broccoli on pizza should be a federal crime.”

“Then I am guessing you don’t want a slice.”

“Correct.”

“If you are not here to eat my food, why are you here? Not that I am not delighted to see you.”

“Ouch. Don’t mind me. I just have some things to work on,” Tony said, and just now Rhodey noticed that he had a tablet under his arm this whole time. Tony turned it on and started tapping on it while standing near the window.

“Do you want to sit down—”

“Nah. I always work like this. It’s better for my back.”

Rhodey finished the pizza slice and reached for another one. Tony was quietly tapping away on the device. Something was off in his friend’s behavior, but Rhodey didn’t want to ask. For the time being, they quietly enjoyed their company. Seemed that Tony needed it a bit more than he did, but it was fine. It was what friends were for. Just to keep himself occupied, Rhodey turned the TV on and stopped on some random movie, paying attention to the actors on the screen and the slices of food.

When he was finishing the third slice, Tony sat down on the couch, on the opposite end, still working and trying to be not too evident.

Half of the pizza was gone and Tony scooted closer to Rhodey, putting his tablet down and watching the movie, still without a word.

The game of hare and hounds ended, when Tony put his head on Rhodey’s shoulder and leaned over his side. Without questioning it, Rhodey raised his arm up and looped over his friend, feeling Tony relaxing and melting. Such position wasn’t anything new for them, as Tony, despite his snark and seemingly prickly personality, was a person who enjoyed close contact and needed it. Yet, he somehow always had troubles with executing what he wanted and preferred to gradually get what he needed, instead of properly asking, which Rhodey knew from all the years they had spent together. Rhodey got used to it over with time and didn’t try to change it. It was comforting and sleepy for both of them when Tony started talking.

“Mmmm. Rhodey?”

“Yeah?”

“Can you… Can you scratch me for a bit?”

It was a timid request, said in a hushed voice. Rhodey didn’t hesitate and started to gently run his fingertips over Tony’s shoulder in short motions.

“Uh. Not here. Lower.”

“Here?” Rhodey asked, moving his hand more to the front.

“Nooo. Lower.”

“Here?”

“No. Lower!”

Rhodey tried to not smile at the demanding tone. Tony just couldn’t say what he wanted, and Rhodey liked to torment him a bit before indulging him. He moved his hand lower, brushing over the stretched side.

“Hmp. Yeah, here.”

And Rhodey complied, gently moving his finger up and down, barely grazing the material. He felt his friend’s breath hitch and heard some small giggles, but the best was feeling Tony’s smile pressed into his shoulder. He continued for a while before he had to ask some questions on his own.

“Hey, Tones.”

"Mhhm?” Tony hummed, enjoying the light tickle all over his side and back, his eyes closing in a relaxed manner.

“For how long do we know each other?”

“Dunno,” Tony answered, his lips twitching into a smile. “Thirty years? Man, you are old,” he teased with a chuckle.

Ah, it would be so easy to jab his fingers into the defenseless flank and execute punishment for being a smartass. Rhodey felt that the moment for that would come later. Once they both would get some more rest.

“Yeah, thirty years. And when will you finally admit that you like being tickled?”

No answer. Which was typical, really. Rhodey continued the sweet brushing over Tony’s shirt.

“You could start with admitting to being ticklish. That’s always a step in a good direction.”

More silence. Rhodey moved his head cautiously, careful to not jostle his friend, and saw that Tony’s eyes were closed, and his mouth was slightly opened. Seemed that the closeness, the touch, it all lulled Tony into a well-deserved sleep.

“Sleep well,” Rhodey said quietly, kissing his best friend’s forehead. Whatever was bothering Tony, they could discuss it once he would get some rest. They had time.

*whispers* you don’t have to be anti Tony to love Steve, and you don’t have to be anti Steve to love Tony. You can love them both.

blog.name: crazybitchygirl
blog.title: It smells like new car in here
blog.description: 16 || Bitchy Girl || Avenger's Fanfic? I'm on my way || Requests are open :)

summary: Can you write a one shot where Steve acts like a priest to the Avengers and Tony makes fun of him?
question: Can you write a one shot where Steve acts like a priest to the Avengers and Tony makes fun of him?
answer:
Sure why not! This is so funny you can hear me laughing :’) thank you so much for this pretty idea. Sorry if it’s a little short but I hope you’ll enjoy it.
Remember, request are always open!
**

That Sunday I was so tired I could easily sleep for another week. Why? Because the day before I was on a mission that involved the Hydra and that was so hard to manage. And I wasn’t still so good thought, I have been an Avenger just for three months so.

I woke up and changed dressing up with a pair of jeans and a shirt, then I went to the living room to say hi to all my company. But when I stepped in all I could saw were the Avengers sifted on the big couch with some little books in their hands and Steve standing up in front of them.

“Ehm, hi?” I tried to not seem confused.

“Y/n good that you’re awake, c'mon, take a seat!” Cap said quickly and I nodded sitting next to Tony who was half-sleeping. “Take this, it’s Sunday, we need to pray sometimes.” He gave me a little book of… Prayers.

“Thanks?” My sentence sounded more like a question.

“I’m swearin, if he doesn’t let me sleep.” Tony muttered at Clint that was next at his right. “I’m going to make his day a hell.”

“Ok, let’s get started!” Steve screamed exited. Wow, it was only 8 of the morning and he looked like he was going to run a marathon. “Page 5, first prayer-”

“Steve, sorry if I may interrupt this-” Tony looked at all of us. “-satanic thing, but what we’re praying for exactly?” He asked and Cap narrowed his eyebrows.

“Tony, this is all but not satanic and we’re praying for God!” He answered.


“Well, we have God here.” Tony pointed at Thor that was trying to understand some words of a prayer and I laughed a little. “We can thank him and then go to eat?”

“No, Tony. This is a serious thing.” Steve closed his eyes and snorted a little.

“I’m serious, I woke up just to eat something. Why the hell do I have to pray? I can pay someone to pray for me!” He replied and my smiled became bigger. I knew I didn’t have to laugh because probably Steve wanted to pray so bad, but seeing them fighting was just hilarious.

“God forgives every bad thing you have done if you pray.” Cap tried again to convince our fried.

“So if I’m a villain like Loki, no offense God of Blonde hair, and I kill 80 people and than I go to pray I’m a considered a good person? Fucking logic Steve.”

“Language.” Clint answered with a smirk.

“Do you kiss your mom with that mouth?” Sam let out smiling.

“Oh oh, Stevie, he said the bad word with the F.” Even Nat jocked about it.

“Ok, fine. You’re still a villain, but it helps! It helps your spirit!”

“I’m a billionaire, I don’t need a spirit.” Tony gave me his book of prayers. “You know what? I’m going to do a fucking coffee because I need to be awake and still I look hell tired and you’re wasting my time, and Jesus, you’re not a priest.” He stand up. “Sunday was made to relax, probably God is watching the TV right now, relaxing, and tou want to disturb him like this? Please, behave old man.”

“Maybe, maybe you’re right.” Everyone in the room took a deep breath because no one wanted to listen to his prayers.

“I know buddy, I’m saving your soul, you should pay me for this, you know?” And then Tony looked at us. “So, who wants to have breakfast?”

I raised my hand. “I’m starving.”

“Shut the fuck up, I didn’t even eat yesterday.” Sam yelled and I nodded a little scared by his voice.

“Ok, let’s go, but first.” Steve took a deep breath and looked at Sam. “Watch you mouth, young boy.”

summary: Being a SHIELD Agent and Tony Stark Falling For You Would Include...
title: Being a SHIELD Agent and Tony Stark Falling For You Would Include...
body:
Requested by @stark-red19

sorry it’s kind of short !

  • okay so you’ve been a SHIELD agent for quite some time
  • but you’ve only been a field agent for a few months
  • you’ve seen tony and the avengers in person briefly on occasions when they come in for briefings with nick fury
  • when the attack on new york happens, you’re sent in along with your division of field agents to get civilians to safety
  • tony (or, iron man, in this case) helps to move the injured to where you’re stationed
  • look although tony is quite the ladies man, he’s not gonna try and flirt while an entire city is being attacked by aliens
  • however, you do catch his eye
  • JARVIS tells him you’re Y/N L/N, an agent for SHIELD
  • tony makes a mental note to go introduce himself to you at the headquarters the next chance he gets
  • because he thinks you’re hella hot
  • and you’re actively risking your life to help others
  • so essentially tony’s dream
  • once the attack on new york has mellowed out, tony has to go to SHIELD headquarters to make a statement on the event
  • you’re there that day, since SHIELD had decided to stop all field missions until further notice after new york
  • once tony’s finished answering questions and speaking to the press and fury, he remembers you and asks tony where your office is
  • (i don’t really know why you have an office but it makes this simpler to write thank u)
  • he goes up there, and you’re pretty shocked to find the world’s richest superhero at your door
  • you invite him in ofc it’s tony stark
  • he makes small talk with you about new york and how he saw you out there and how grateful he was for you risking your life for others
  • you’re really shocked
  • seeing that you weren’t the only one out there
  • and he decided to approach you directly to thank you
  • of course you thanked him, too
  • after all, without him, new york might’ve fallen that day
  • he casually brushes it off as if it were nothing
  • thats tony stark for u
  • he’s so used to being a badass it’s not a big deal to him anymore
  • after that you start to talk about other things
  •  it’s just a casual conversation really
  • and that’s when tony does it
  • “so, anyway, i was wondering if you’d go out with me?”
  • he’s so smooth
  • time literally stops for you because did motherfucking tony stark just ask me out?
  • yes he did
  • you instantly snap back into reality
  • “y-yeah!  yes, that sounds great.”
  • “perfect.  i’ll send my helicopter to get you tomorrow at 8?”
  • yeah that’s right tony’s going all-out he doesn’t play around with first dates you bet he’s using that billionaire status to his advantage

this one had no solid ending im sorry

Hope you enjoyed!  Feedback is welcomed ~

  • once tony’s finished answering questions and speaking to the press and fury, he remembers you and asks tony where your office is
  • (i don’t really know why you have an office but it makes this simpler to write thank u)
  • he goes up there, and you’re pretty shocked to find the world’s richest superhero at your door
  • you invite him in ofc it’s tony stark
  • he makes small talk with you about new york and how he saw you out there and how grateful he was for you risking your life for others
  • you’re really shocked
  • seeing that you weren’t the only one out there
  • and he decided to approach you directly to thank you
  • of course you thanked him, too
  • after all, without him, new york might’ve fallen that day
  • he casually brushes it off as if it were nothing
  • thats tony stark for u
  • he’s so used to being a badass it’s not a big deal to him anymore
  • after that you start to talk about other things
  •  it’s just a casual conversation really
  • and that’s when tony does it
  • “so, anyway, i was wondering if you’d go out with me?”
  • he’s so smooth
  • time literally stops for you because did motherfucking tony stark just ask me out?
  • yes he did
  • you instantly snap back into reality
  • “y-yeah!  yes, that sounds great.”
  • “perfect.  i’ll send my helicopter to get you tomorrow at 8?”
  • yeah that’s right tony’s going all-out he doesn’t play around with first dates you bet he’s using that billionaire status to his advantage

this one had no solid ending im sorry

Hope you enjoyed!  Feedback is welcomed ~

body:
Steve is writing a shopping list when Tony comes in.

Tony: “ ‘Chamomile tea, for Tony?’ Why do I need chamomile tea?”

Steve: “You need to chill, babe. You snapped at me - for no reason!”

(very loosely based on a scene from wicked lovely)

tags: the downsides to being/becoming a hero
tony is one of the few we actually see dealing (or not) with the shit he went through
title: Tony’s Flashbacks
body:
I can’t see
And I can’t hear
And I can’t feel
Memory takes over
My eyes are blind
My ears are deaf
My skin is numb
Until it’s over 

Instead I feel their hands
Their grip, tight bands
Forcing me under
My breath, I hold
Against water cold
Until I can no longer 

Now I can’t see
And I can’t hear
And I can’t feel
Memory takes over
My eyes are blind
My ears are deaf
My skin is numb
Until it’s over

 
Instead I hear the whine
They’re out of time
I’m paralysed and helpless
My heart he takes
My trust he breaks
Of the two, death hurts less 

Now I can’t see
And I can’t hear
And I can’t feel
Memory takes over
My eyes are blind
My ears are deaf
My skin is numb
Until it’s over 

Instead I see my flight
In alien night
I bear the nuke through the wormhole
My life I give
So more can live
But then back to Earth I fall 

Now I can’t see
And I can’t hear
And I can’t feel
Memories take over
They’re all I can see
All I can hear
All I can feel
Over and over and over
